text: @realDonaldTrump You lie more than anyone I know. Your leadership has us as the worst Covid19 cases in the world. Your leadership has sent people to hospitals for drinking bleach. You said we had five cases and they'd disappear. You have not provided proper leadership for this. Bad news.
